ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] PVP Deity based server question
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t see why they would do that. Each character is a seperate entity. if you roleplay you can just pretend you don t even know any other alts exist. luv,
ygData.messageBody:
I don't see why they would do that. Each character is a seperate entity. if
you roleplay you can just pretend you don't even know any other alts exist.
luv,
-Su

>
> Is it true that on the PVP deity server that you can
> only create one character?
> Because I made a de sk and my man says I have to erase
> it so he can make one on that server since you can
> only have one~
>
> Thanx~
> Ecko
